metadata.title: CVE-2022-39237 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: syslabs/sif is the Singularity Image Format (SIF) reference implementation.In versions prior to 2.8.1the `github.com/sylabs/sif/v2/pkg/integrity`package did not verify that the hash algorithm(s) used arecryptographically secure when verifying digital signatures. A patch isavailable in version >= v2.8.1 of the module. Users are encouraged toupgrade. Users unable to upgrade may independently validate that the hashalgorithm(s) used for metadata digest(s) and signature hash arecryptographically secure.

criterions.comment: golang-github-sylabs-sif package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
singularity-container package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
